summary: Categorized Favorites Menu reworked for Ninja, Thief, or Assassin Characters
descriptionHtml:
A single edited configuration for Categorized Favorites Menu that will benefit players playing as either Thieves, Assassins, Ninjas, or shady characters in general.

This only includes the single configuration file so you will need to have Categorized Favorites Menu installed already.

This config supports most samurai and ninja weapons and armors.
(Katanas, Kunai, Nodachi, etc)

I also supports the following mods:
- Sneak Tools
- Throwing Weapons WIP
- Throwing Weapons - Death From Afar
- Coas -ninjaweps -spells
- Ultimate Potions & Poisons
- Tactless Toxins
- Headbomb\'s Better Sorting

And any more later on if i find some.

Feel free to leave any suggestions, comments, or concerns.
Enjoy-
author: OnCloudTwenty
